comments.body:
range over Exemptions.Namespaces and ensure they pass `k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/api/validation#ValidateNamespaceName` and contain no duplicates

range over Exemptions.RuntimeClasses and ensure they pass `k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/api/validation#NameIsDNSSubdomain` and contain no duplicates

range over Exemptions.Usernames and ensure it contains no empty strings and no duplicates
